thread.title: Aladdin fan theory is spot on
thread.title_full: Aladdin fan theory is spot on

title: Aladdin fan theory is spot on
text:
Director confirms Aladdin fan theory is actually true Staff Writers news.com.au Director confirms Aladdin fan theory is actually true Staff Writers news.com.au Aladdin fan theory: Is Genie also the peddler? 0:29 
One Aladdin fan theory has turned out to be true - the peddler from the beginning of the movie is actually Genie. Courtesy: Walt Disney Pictures October 19th 2015 2 hours ago /video/video.news.com.au/Entertainment/Movies/ 
IT’S been 23 years since Aladdin was released, and only now has a popular fan theory about the movie been confirmed. 
In case it’s been a while since you’ve seen the film, let us refresh your memory about a character known as ‘the peddler’. 
He appears at the very start of the movie and sets up the story by saying, “It begins on a dark night, where a dark man waits with a dark purpose”. 
For years, fans have been debating the true identity of the peddler, with some claiming it’s actually the Genie in disguise. 
And it turns out they’re 100 per cent right. 
“That’s true!” said director Ron Clements to E! News . Other Stories
